Label: CNOFS VEFI Lightning Detector, low rate data (eclipse portion of CNOFS orbit) - Robert H. Holzworth (University of Washington)

VariableDescription.Name: lat
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           CNOFS VEFI/LD low rate data
#     PROJECT                         CNOFS
#     SOURCE_NAME                     CNOFS>Communications Navigation Outage Forecast System
#     INSTRUMENT                      VEFI lightning detector
#     PI_NAME                         Robert H. Holzworth
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  University of Washington
#     PI_VEFI_NAME                    Robert F. Pfaff
#     PI_VEFI_AFFILIATION             GSFC
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Electric Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   CNOFS
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  cnofs_vefi_LD_500ms
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 cnofs_vefi_LD_500ms_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      CNOFS VEFI Lightning Detector, low rate data (eclipse portion of CNOFS orbit)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 500 ms
#     ORBIT                           Eclipse portion of C/NOFS orbit   3050
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2012-May-08/16:49
#     TEXT                            This data file contains the low rate data from the VEFI lightning detector.                            
#     TEXT                             Two photodiodes measure white light irradiance in 2 look directions and for                           
#                                      7 threshold values. Reference: Jacobson et al, J Atm Ocean Tech, 2011, doi:10.1175/JTECH-D-11-00047.1 
#     DATA_USE                        Users are requested to contact Dr. R. H. Holzworth at Univ of Washington prior                         
#                                      to publication of any lightning detector data                                                         
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time from UT 0000-Jan-01 00:00:00
#  2. C/NOFS latitude in degrees
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 21:47:30 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. C/NOFS latitude in degrees
#
EPOCH                        LATITUDE
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            deg
23-04-2008 21:51:25.067      -2.91609

VariableDescription.Name: ldn
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Number of samples with white-light irradiance in 7 bins defined by the irradiance boundary values 0.23, 3.7, 11, 23, 39, 60, 84, > 84 mW/m^2 (north-viewing diode)
